thread.title: 'Ant-Man' sequel announced, Marvel Cinematic Universe Phase 3
thread.title_full: 'Ant-Man' sequel announced, Marvel Cinematic Universe Phase 3

title: 'Ant-Man' sequel announced, Marvel Cinematic Universe Phase 3
text:
Updated: 1:03 p.m.   12:06 p.m.   'Ant-Man' sequel announced, Marvel Cinematic Universe Phase 3 ﻿ Paul Rudd plays the role of Scott Lang, a.k.a. Ant-Man, in “Ant-Man.” Related Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
Marvel Cinematic Universe's Phase 2 is in the books, and the film production company is now beginning Phase 3. 
To mark the beginning, Marvel announced "Ant-Man" has a sequel and it will be called "Ant-Man and the Wasp." 
Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) will fight the baddies alongside Hope Van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) in the second "Ant-Man installment. It is the first Marvel Studios film that includes the heroine's name. 
Because of the newly announced sequel, the dates of other Phase 3 movies will be adjusted. 
"Black Panther" will be released on Feb. 16, 2018. "Captain Marvel" is slated for the big screen on March 8, 2019, Marvel announced. 
Three untitled films will premiere on May 1, 2020, July 10, 2020, and Nov. 6, 2020. 
"Ant-Man" had a budget of $130 million. Its U.S. gross came in at $176 million as of September, IMDB reported.
